name: @GradFlipTest
author: AFNI Developers
description: Script to test the correct flip for a data set when using 1dDW_Grad_o_Mat++.

inputs.description: Set of column-wise g- or b-matrix elements ("AFNI"-style format, "diagonal-first")
inputs.name: Column-Wise Matrix A

inputs.description: Set of column-wise g- or b-matrix elements ("TORTOISE"-style format, "row-first")
inputs.name: Column-Wise Matrix T

inputs.description: Optional mask (probably whole brain); otherwise, automasking is performed
inputs.name: Mask

inputs.description: Can input bvals, if necessary (but shouldn't be necessary?)
inputs.name: Bvals

inputs.description: Set minimum FA value for tracking (default X=0.2)
inputs.name: FA Threshold

inputs.description: Set minimum tract length to keep a tract when propagating (default L=30mm)
inputs.name: Tract Length Threshold

inputs.description: Output name of text file that stores recommended flip option
inputs.name: Prefix

inputs.description: Handle tiny negative values in gradient vectors
inputs.name: Check Absolute Minimum

inputs.description: Scale output to 1000, as in 3dDWItoDT (probably not necessary)
inputs.name: Scale Output to 1000 Flag

inputs.description: Rename working directory output; useful if running multiple iterations
inputs.name: Working Directory

output-files.description: Text file that stores recommended flip option
output-files.name: Output File

output-files.description: Temporary working directory to store intermediate files
output-files.name: Temporary Working Directory
